content:
AccessControlType Enum

Definition

Specifies whether an AccessRule object is used to allow or deny access. These values are not flags, and they cannot be combined.

In this Article

public enum AccessControlType
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
AccessControlType

Fields

Allow

The AccessRule object is used to allow access to a secured object.
Deny

The AccessRule object is used to deny access to a secured object.
